message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $13,000. I believe it will bring you great value.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is quite high. How about we settle at $12,500?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,000?
